application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - REAR Garden - Hybrid Poplar	Mature Poplar at rear centre of the garden. Prominent fruiting body shelf Fungi likely causing brown rot on the heartwood.  5 DAY NOTICEFell tree in sections to ground level. Poor condition - please can a 5 day exemption be consideredT2 - REAR Garden - Hybrid Poplar	Mature Poplar at the rear left of the garden has large cavity up to 3m at the crown break. Significant decay in the trees' heartwood.Fell tree in sections to ground level. Poor condition - please can a 5 day exemption be consideredT3  - REAR Garden - Cherry Reduce all aspects of crown by approx 1.25m and shape.T5  - REAR Garden - Eucalyptus Reduce all aspects of crown by approx 2m back to previous points of reduction.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
